Text: You folks here on TPB need to get this and get it out to as many people as possible... Alex Jones has cleared this and all his other movies to be re-distributed via peer to peer and DVD copies as much as possible. If you enjoy this movie please do your part, research this movie, learn more, burn copies, share with friends, family, anyone! The truth CAN set you free!

Also, feel free to join Prisonplanet.com to watch the rest of his movies in hi-quality (and download them for burning as well) for very little (I forget how much it is I bought a yearly subscription and  its a few bucks a month) as well as get his weekly news shows and other good content from other people in the fight for freedom.
